alert.note: Alert for Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Yates and north central Steuben Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chimney Bluffs State Park to near Avoca. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Penn Yan, Benton, Potter, Middlesex, Pulteney, Italy, Rushville, Guyanoga, Branchport and Ferguson Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
